Pre-Game Insights: The Colorado Rockies need to go 12-13 in their remaining 25 games to avoid a second-straight 100-loss season.
The Rockies have gone 30-34 (.469) this season against teams with a record of.500 or better, and they will face several teams with a record of.500 or better in their remaining games.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Colorado Rockies will face the Baltimore Orioles, Atlanta Braves, Milwaukee Brewers, Detroit Tigers, Chicago Cubs, Arizona Diamondbacks, St. Louis Cardinals, and Los Angeles Dodgers in their remaining games.
